name: Komanwel Fall
description: Along the trunk road nr 1, from KL to Rawang, several recreation parks are located. Opposite the popular Hutan Lipur Kanching, there is another park, the Commonwealth Park, a.k.a Taman Rimba Komanwel. It has a small waterfall, which can be reached easily from the car park.The trail follows a small stream with a few cascades. It is a nice walk with lots of shade. Halfway you will find a small but attractive waterfall. The trail ends at the Commonwealth park, with a horse riding school and various facilities.The Commonwealth ParkCheck if you need a permit before planning a waterfall trip. More information hereWaterfalls can be dangerous ! Always take care about your safetyVisitor Comments

imgDesc: It is only a small stream
